body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Arthur Morgan and I work for AutoPro Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marilyn. Could you kindly provide me with your phone number? I just need to verify some details.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two two two, zero zero one one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn. And may I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's m dot hall at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about the pricing on the car I'm interested in.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Marilyn. Let me check that for you. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Marilyn. Feel free to reach out if you have any more questions. Have a great day!
